name: Benyamin Bolhassani
description: Experienced Laravel developer specializing in PHP, Laravel, Nuxt.js, Next.js, and React. Creator of Eventoment, a comprehensive event management platform.

projects.title: Eventoment
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for organizing and managing events and activities. Built with Laravel, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js.

projects.title: Tourism Reservation System
projects.description: Developed a reservation system for tours and leisure activities, including a bus ticket booking service.

workExperience.title: Team Leader
responsibilities: Led the development of Eventoment, a social platform for event management using Laravel, Vue.js, and Nuxt.js.
Developed custom Laravel packages, including laravel-dynamic-resources, to simplify CRUD operations in Laravel applications.
Implemented REST APIs and designed database structures for scalable web applications.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure high-quality deliverables.

workExperience.title: Developer
responsibilities: Developed Progressive Web Applications (PWA) using Laravel and Vue.js.
Optimized websites for SEO and performance.
Created a bus ticket reservation web service and a tourism reservation system.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time.
